title: Script logo of the band Esser
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122033446im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ae_5353.png)

I am wondering what this type is. It is so smooth. I like it very much. It might not be a font though, but I want to give it a try. Any idea?

 [‹ "Palau de la Música Catalana" lovely serif face](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122033446/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47889 "Go to previous forum topic") [Details headline face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122033446/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47829 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mydot2001
